Html:
Installed version 0.4.0 for a universal (Windows 10) app via nuget. Installation works but compilation is not possible afterwards.

Compiler output is:

Die Ladungsdatei "C:\Users\MYUSER\Documents\Visual Studio Projects\QrCodeTest2\packages\QrCode.Net.0.4.0.0\lib\netcore45\Gma.QrCodeNet.Encoding\Themes\Generic.xaml" ist nicht vorhanden.

(File Generic.xaml can't be found).

The same problem occurs with a Windows 8.1 app project.

Any ideas what is wrong here?
